trans-unit.resname: PPCY·3 | Avatar of Hope | Card Name
PPCY·3 | Avatar of Hope | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying If you have 3 life or less, Avatar of Hope costs o6 less to play. Avatar of Hope may block any number of creatures.
